# The `InstructionBase` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Base class for instructions consumed by the simulation pipeline. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Base class for instructions consumed by the simulation pipeline.

This class tracks data dependencies as well as generic properties of the instruction.

Definition at line 496 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/instruction-h">Instruction.h</a>.
